mapper.select: select f.position_id as positionId, p.position_name as positionName, p.position_salary as positionSalary, c.id as companyId, c.company_name as companyName, f.is_send as isSend, f.create_time as createTime from findjob f ,company c,position p where f.user_id=#{userId} and f.position_id = p.id and p.company_id = c.id order by f.create_time

select f.position_id as positionId, p.position_name as positionName, u.id as userId, u.user_name as userName, u.gender as gender, u.phone as phone, u.user_edu as userEdu, u.email as email, u.user_resume as userResume, f.is_send as isSend, f.create_time as createTime from findjob f ,user u,position p,company c where c.id = #{companyId} and f.position_id = p.id and f.user_id = u.id order by f.create_time
